message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $87.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $86 for the product.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $88. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
